Package org.aposin.licensescout.exporter

Class AbstractVelocityExporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.aposin.licensescout.exporter.AbstractVelocityExporter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IReportExporter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HtmlExporter, TxtExporter
    public abstract class AbstractVelocityExporter
extends Object
implements IReportExporter
    The Exporter creates a report listing all archives including license information.

    This implementation is a base class for exporters based on Velocity templates to generate the output.

    Subclasses have to provide a default template by implementing getDefaultTemplate().

    If necessary, subclasses can put additional information to the VelocityContext by overriding additionalSetup(VelocityContext, OutputResult).

      • additionalSetup

        protected void additionalSetup​(org.apache.velocity.VelocityContext context,
                               OutputResult outputResult)
        Do additional setup of VelocityContext.

        This is a template method that can be used to put additional data collected from the outputResult to the VelocityContext. Default is to do nothing.

        Parameters:
        context - the velocity context that can be modified
        outputResult - results from the license scan

      • getDefaultTemplate

        protected abstract org.apache.velocity.Template getDefaultTemplate()
        Obtains the default velocity template to use in the export method.

        This method is called if no template is set in the configuration for the output type.

        Returns:
        the velocity template to use
